title: K.3
text: The student will apply history and social science skills to define patriotism and explain how communities express patriotism by
subject: History & Social Science
subs: identifying the American and Virginia flags;
identifying national and state symbols, including, but not limited to the bald eagle, the dogwood, and the cardinal;
recognizing the Pledge of Allegiance and the National Anthem; and
identifying the current president and explaining that the president is the leader of the United States and is elected by voters.
